document.full_text: a massive wildfire that has charred more than 350 square miles of forest and scrub land in eastern arizona raged out of control for a ninth day on monday as it crept near populated areas along the new mexico border.
document.title: eastern arizona fire claims nearly 350 square miles
lines_and_colors: a massive wildfire that has charred more than 350 square miles of forest and scrub land in eastern arizona raged out of control for a ninth day on monday as it crept near populated areas along the new mexico border.
